Text: According to the Treaty of Ḥudaibiyah (see footnote for 48:1-3), Muslims who chose to move to Mecca would not be returned to Muslims in Medina, and Meccan pagans who accepted Islam and chose to move to Medina would be returned to Mecca (except for women).
Those who moved to Mecca to marry pagans.
lit., nor come up with a falsehood they have forged between their own hands and legs.
